SobreMi.text1: I was part of Henry's bootcamp, which gave me +600 hours of code, practice and learning. In which I learned Javascript, React, Node.JS, Express, Redux, HTML, CSS. And I continue to learn new technologies that lead me to an excellent job, such as typescript, nextJS, React Native, Mongo DB.
SobreMi.text2: Although I do not have work experience as such, I feel empowered to give my best and learn what there is to know, I consider myself a person who learns quickly and is eager to prove it.

Experiencia.text: I work for a company in the healthcare industry that uses a cryptocurrency called MDCx. Within this company, I am a member of the mobile app development team, specializing as a full-stack developer. Our primary focus is to create a telemedicine application that allows users to access medical services remotely. In my role, I am responsible for both front-end and back-end development, ensuring that the application is user-friendly, secure, and meets the high standards required in the medical field.
